Package Entity

Class Order

java.lang.Object
Entity.Order
public class Order extends Object
This class contains all the information of a particular order.
It includes the items in the order, the total price and the staff that took this order.

  • Field Details

    • items

      private HashMap<Food,​Double[]> items
      Food items in this order. Key is the food item. Value is a list containing the quantity and total price of the food item.

    • totalPrice

      private double totalPrice
      Total price of this order.

    • staff

      private Staff staff
      The staff that took this order.

    • getItems

      the HashMap of food items in this order

      Sets the price of this order.
      Parameters:

    • getStaff

      public Staff getStaff()

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns:
      the total number of food items in this order.

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      Returns:
      the total price of this order before GST.

      Returns:

    • checkInOrder

      public boolean checkInOrder​(Food food)
      Checks if the food item is in this order.
      Parameters:
      food - the food item to check.
      Returns:
      true if the food item is in this order, false otherwise.

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder()
      Prints the food items in this order.
